price: 92 Mais s’il est du nombre des négateurs égarés,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
